valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 29 Oct 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 30 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low Cromarty 989 expected Forties 993 by 0600 tomorrow. Atlantic low moving rather quickly northeast expected 200 miles west of Shannon 965 by same time
